website_summaries.verdict: A well-built board that suits all but the hardest of grinders. Terrific value for the money.
pros: Bearings, truck, and wheels are of good quality
cons: More flex would be better for long rides
Trucks and wheels can be tight

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this board due to the positive reviews. I needed a solid board to commute to and from campus and that was it. It was fine but after two days of use it already started to crack on me. I am very dissapointed in the quality of this board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old time skater and Yuki(Siberian Husky)
customer_reviews.text: I've got a 2.5 year old Siberian husky. I'll be 54 years old this Monday.I live in Georgia. During this global pandemic, Yuki(my husky) and myself go out almost every morning. I strap his harness on grab my longboard and head out. It's epic. He burns his energy off, and this old timer gets his skate on. For the price, you just can't beat the Quest longboard. It's working out great for both of us...
customer_reviews.author: Sneaky Pete

customer_reviews.title: The front wheels ran off from the longboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought it two months ago and only rode it at most 20-25 times. A week ago, while I was riding it, the board studdenly stuck, I fell off and hurt. So I bought protect pads and tried again today. The board didn’t stuck but the front wheels ran off from the board. It was so dangerous, I will not try to fix it. I will look for other brand because I know safety is the most important thing.
customer_reviews.author: Qipeng L.

customer_reviews.title: Bought due to high reviews, but not thrilled
customer_reviews.text: Good price, sharp-looking board...but trashy trucks, noisy bushings and I can hardly bear the bearings. You will need to tighten things up after first or second ride. You must buy additional (quality) bearings or else suffer. Maybe even get new trucks too if you want to be thrilled with this board. 3 stars because I’m NOT thrilled with this board, but the price is great and the deck seems good—no splits yet as others have observed. -Blessings
customer_reviews.author: Billy Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Big Guy Big Board
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to start this off saying that I'm a little bigger when compared to most people weighing in at 300 lbs and a height of 6 foot 7, so I really wasnt expecting this board to last or even make it a week. Regardless I've been using it about a month for a few miles back and forth for college and its holding up. Only thing is the bearing weren't the best so a quick spray of WD40 and they work like new.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Veers left automatically?
customer_reviews.text: As a first-time boarder and at 200 lbs 5'11 I enjoyed learning on this board since it's nice and big, But had an issue with it where it would always veer left, no matter what. Even after messing with the trucks, tightening things, changing out bearings, practicing and trying to ride with no lean at all, the board had a dramatic tendency to veer let. I'd have to constantly put my foot down and peddle right to correct it. For other reasons I just gave up and sent it back. I'm not sure what was up with that though
customer_reviews.author: johnpratt

customer_reviews.title: READ BEFORE YOU BUY
customer_reviews.text: Okay so when I bought this I knew that the bearings and flex zone where gonna be alright and so forth. The packaging was horrible my box came all tore up and retaped again . But besides that the board is AMAZING like this picture does not due the baitd justice cause it's way bigger kinda awkward to carry around but it's so beautiful and rides smoothly I think I got it for a really good price
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: The board’s finish is not good. Look inside the Q and there is a lot of black specks and a very noticeable blemish to the right of the Q. Little details- sure, but it looks terrible. The wheels look much better than online. Otherwise, I am enjoying it and with some lube and adjustments it rides good. The plastic wrap over the whole thing is not good either. It took a complete disassemble of the board to clear out the plastic. It did have a side benefit of learning how this board is put together though. Tighten up your quality control, Quest, and you’d have a much better product.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great board for cruising and moderate downhill.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great longboard, it's well built and at $60 is a steal. This is the second one I bought for my daughter (she loves it, I use it too), the last one was stolen. She liked it so much she wanted the exact same one. It's great for cruising or going downhill at moderate speeds. You might want to check the tightness of the trucks after a couple weeks of use, I found they were coming loose a bit after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Preston B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Board for Commuting
customer_reviews.text: Getting back into skateboarding and was looking for a decent longboard to move around town while doing photography. Decided on this one as the reviews were good and the price was right. I have no complaints. It's not perfect, I did notice that one of the axles had a little paint on it making one washer and bearing get stuck but I just sanded it and it's good to go now. I will probably end up replacing the bearings but for the price it's a great board.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, especially for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: *super smooth ride *easy to ride *well balanced stiffness to flex ratio (previous boards i rode seemed too spongy or stiff) *good on turns/curves *trucks and board are great! Cons: *fit/finish is a bit rough on the grip tape *bearings are ok but not efficient. They are pretty smooth though. Good enough to get a smooth roll, you just might lose momentum faster. Overall build quality 4.5. I highly recommend this for the price and quality. I am planning on eventually swapping the og bearings for reds. Taking this to a local state park and will report back. Cheers.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H

customer_reviews.title: Best afordable spare board for you or your friends
customer_reviews.text: Great board, great price The board is ridable out of the package but the usual needs to be upgraded later on (trucks, wheels, bushings and bearings) Besides that the board itself is worth its price as its made with a stronger plywood than the average plywood boards The boards tail was ran over by a jeep yet half of the plywood broke leaving another half still holding my back trucks to my deck. It is no longer safe to ride it so i upgraded to a magneto board which is better for about 100$ more But i would definetly get another quest board later on if i need a spare board thats reliable and aforbadle :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great board, tough, durable, big and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great long board. I feel like it's sturdy and ready to go. I got this to add some fun into my exercise routing and that I did. You don't go as fast as a bike on this thing, but it does use different muscles so it's a lot of fun. This board is HUGE. I've never had a board this big. It's fun to take to a flat area or slight downhill and just cruise around. Feels super healthy and fun at the same time. Forget the gym, get a board man!
customer_reviews.author: TommyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Good board
customer_reviews.text: nice longboard for the price. It is about 4 feet long and pretty strong. only gripe was the chucks were/are a little on the lose side so changing direction is easy but going straight at times can be a hassle as you have to constantly make adjustments. otherwise the price is great and the board appears to be decent in quality.
customer_reviews.author: JJV

customer_reviews.title: So it wasn't the best board to start with
customer_reviews.text: Ok. So it wasn't the best board to start with. It rode pretty decent, but it wasn't anything great. I bought it for the deck and wheel size lol BUT I threw some sidewinder trucks on it and replaced the bearings with bones reds and now it rides like it cost me $300. This board is now awesome! (Note: if you read this and copy what I did to it, you're gonna wanna lift the front about a half inch and the back about a quarter inch or you're gonna get wheel bite. Them sidewinders ain't nothing to mess with if you don't know what you're doing) lol
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I opened this and right out of the package it was perfect!!! Just tried it for the first time today, and I learned very easily. I have very limited experience with longboards and I never learned how to skateboard, but the control is easy and it goes very fast. My only issue with this was actually that the plastic packaging is very hard to get off and goes under many of the screws, so it’s hard to clean out. It came in two days, which was before it was due to be here so that’s a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: michele l ralofsky

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and easy to ride
customer_reviews.text: This board is very fun and easy to ride. The board was recommended to me by a friend as an easy way to learn how to skateboard. Its very smooth and stable. This is my first skatboard and after a little practice I feel very comfortable cruising around on it. Only downsides are that it is big and heavy but it is a longboard so that is expected. There is a little rattling coming from one of the wheels or trucks. I haven't been able to pin down where its coming from but it hasnt affected performance.
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorFamily1138

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality, great workout, FUN
customer_reviews.text: I took this board to a reputable shop in the Katy Mills Mall (Houston), the staff were impressed at the quality of the board at this price range. I'm 45 and have always enjoyed cycling ... I cannot Put into words how much I've enjoyed this board (recommend a stick if you want a nice core workout ) There was an annoying creak in one of my trucks (I assumed it was because I'm 235) but it turns out it was just a simple adjustment .... If land paddling ... You will need the best bearings you can find, everything Else is simply wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Kanye East

customer_reviews.title: Dude perfect! Just buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to longboarding and rode this board for the first time the day I got it and I have to say if I could give it 7 out of 5 stars I would. For a beginner this board is hands down amazing. The ride is smooth and just like surfing on asphalt. The whole experience has solidified my love for longboarding. Some people say it has needed tuning from the factory however mine arrived perfect, no wheel bite, trucks weren't too loose, wheels weren't too loose or tight. Love this board! I wish I was riding it now instead of writing this review.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Russo

customer_reviews.title: Rattles like a cheap board!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fast longboard. It's really smooth to ride. The biggest problem is it RATTLES horribly! Doesn't matter how much you tighten it. It turns heads and is super distracting. I have a $130 board I purchased from a local skate shop that is SILENT. Probably going to replace the trucks on the Quest board because of how bad the rattling is.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Engelbrecht

customer_reviews.title: Made my teenage son happy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this board! He says the wheels are very quiet, and the board rides very smooth. I personally know nothing about skateboards, so I am taking his word for it. I bought it for him as a congratulations present when he succeeded in getting his drivers license! He also said the construction of the board was flawless and extremely well done. He can’t wait to get some lights to put along the underside of the board and deck it out so he can ride safely at night around the neighborhood. Very pleased with the results
customer_reviews.author: Adrian brileigh popplestone

customer_reviews.title: Win-win
customer_reviews.text: He hasn't broke this one yet so I'm calling it a win. And if he does, it wasn't an outrageous price, so that's win-win. He's a 13 year old just trying to learn so I have a feeling we'll go through a few longboards & skateboards. I better see if they make skateboards too!
customer_reviews.author: CHAZELLE R.

customer_reviews.title: Great board for old timer's and beginners!!!
customer_reviews.text: My first Maple Bambo blend Board, I'm a big guy this board handles like a dream, and at the price, upgrading is easy but don't touch the trucks they are awesome! Update: I've got a few boards since this one it's still by far my favorite. I've had some major spills and it's still beyond perfect. If you don't adjust your trucks and such you will get some wobble on some serious downhill, but it's mega stable, I recently picked up the drop-thru and I can't enjoy it as much as this Board.
customer_reviews.author: Syed J.

customer_reviews.title: My first board and I love it
customer_reviews.text: My first longboard, very impressed. I don't know much but it got great reviews and was a reasonable price. Rides very smoothly and turning is easy. Design on the bottom adds some nice art without being over the top. The wood grain is a touch as well. Love the curved, surfboard shape, it's classic looks awesome. The only reason it didn't get 5 stars is one of teh wheels rattles a bit but that can be fixed with a screwdriver and a few minutes but thought it was worth mentioning. Overall, good quality and good price, perfect for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Smooth like butter
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Long board ever, now I'm 30 and havent used a skateboard since I was 12. Being older and not wanting to get seriously injured, I figured a long board would be great just to cruise and get some extra cardio in. It looks great, feels great, smooth ride, runs over pebbles with ease while keeping the ride smooth. It holds my weight really well (260 lbs), definitely would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Bahahaha

customer_reviews.title: Good board. Strong too
customer_reviews.text: Good board. Strong too! I'm over 200lbs and it holds up fine. I dumped the board a few times but the scratches were minimal. I'd always recommend a bamboo board. The only thing, I'd swap out the bearings when you get it. The trucks will hold up fine for a while. And the wheels are pretty decent too.
customer_reviews.author: Fake Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Freaking love this thing. Dont buy anything until you throw new bearings in your shopping cart. I jumped on board with the bones reds and anything is better than the stock ones. Sold my stock bearings to those dorks with the spinny things for 5 bucks. Win win.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Beginner board, great for casual rider
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I wanted a board to get around college, and this one has gotten me around college for sure. Ive had it for a year now, and the only problem I've had is that the board is beginning to crack around the screws and the screws have been rusty for about 8 months. It still rides, but I sense that it's going to give out if I use it for another year. Also, the grip tape isn't particularly strong, but some people prefer it that way. I personally have used my board every single day here at college so I expect some wear. I'm glad I bought this board, it was a steal at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and lot's of fun! My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this board to my 11 year old son on his birthday and he is in love with it! The size, is perfect for him, at least it works great for him. He has used it hard for three whole weeks so far and it's holding up just amazing. Great quality board! Advice: use some WD40 on the wheel to allow them spin faster and maintain. Also, have your child learn to use it well before they go on their own because it does move fast as it maintains momentum. Get your child some gloves specially made for longboarding.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great board. It has good flex in the deck
customer_reviews.text: Great board. It has good flex in the deck, but stiff enough to be responsive. The bamboo is a nice touch; the maple is nice quality. Wheels are good quality and the proper hardness and size for the average longboard rider, i.e. old dudes that used to skate in the 80's. Nearing quality is above any other board at this price. My only complaint is that the truck cushions, doughnuts back in my day, are soft. I know its a cruiser but a harder cushion would fit more rider weight, but awesome board. Thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: 57o77

customer_reviews.title: Awesome board but...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not bad for the money. The trucks are perfect for those super aggressive turns. If you're anything like me, it's perfect for carving! But this comes with a caveat. The bearings that were already on the board SUCK. One actually failed completely on day four and they all appeared to be of varying age, so anytime I tried to go down an incline, I would get massive speed wobble. Changed them out for some Reds and it rides like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: chris smith

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It broke in half weak materials awful barring slow af
customer_reviews.author: rusty violette

customer_reviews.title: Board Wouldn't Turn
customer_reviews.text: No matter how much I loosened the trucks the board would not turn.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Good board, might need to tighten wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Really good beginner board. I got this for my girlfriend and am considering buying myself one. It's sturdy and so far has put up with rookie crashes and falls. Pros: - low cost, especially compared to high-end boards. - sturdy and durable - takes sticks and stones pretty well - Turn radius is pretty good Cons: - when I first started using it, it would rattle whenever my weight was centered over the wheels (not turning), I fixed this by tightening the screws and it has been smooth sailing since. I recommend tightening up any screws before giving it a go. Otherwise, I'm very satisfied with this board!
customer_reviews.author: BradS

customer_reviews.title: Great Longboard!
customer_reviews.text: The trucks come super loose so make sure you tighten them. This may be the norm for all longboards, but I'm a noob so I found out the importance of adjusting your trucks the hard way. I love the ride of this board, it's my first ever board of any kind, super easy to cruise with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Good board, bearings need oil (some only spin for < 1 second)
customer_reviews.text: The bearings on this thing are very dry and need oil when you receive the board, so buy some oil, or just some new bearings along with the board. Personally, I would've enjoyed a drop-through board more because I'm a beginner and I think they look cooler. Also, the trucks will need to be tightened if you are a beginner and you will need to use a tool for that, so buy that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Olson

customer_reviews.title: Good board, best price
customer_reviews.text: Good board, best price. I've owned 3 boards ranging from sector 9 to custom builds in the $250-180 range. This board is sturdy and the trucks have a decent turning radius and speed.
customer_reviews.author: J Bow

customer_reviews.title: Great, fast, board.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's fast, it's perfect length for cruising. Not sure if right decision for 60 yr old that hasn't been on skateboard since teens. It is a solid board. I am 5'9" and weigh 250. I know someone younger than me and experienced would love it. I wanted something to get my dog running, this is not it for me, i think i will try a push scooter.
customer_reviews.author: mckensie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great board for the price! Other reviews have a problem with the bearings but all you have to do is loosen the nut that holds them because they are on too tight. This board can also take some abuse and doesn't break easy. If you're going to buy a board this style and you're just getting into longboarding I recommend people get started with this board. I did and don't regret it. Edit: many people including me noticed long cracks along the underside of the board. I realized it's only the bottom layer splitting so it's not much to worry about in my opinion although I understand it still does not look pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Long board
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this board! He has been riding it even though there is snow outside. Great gift. He doesn't know how to ride very well and he is able to ride this board. Definitely a good purchase for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: P. ALMQUIST

customer_reviews.title: I recently decided to learn how to skateboard/longboard and I like the stability that longboards offer over skateboards
customer_reviews.text: The board rides well. I recently decided to learn how to skateboard/longboard and I like the stability that longboards offer over skateboards. The first board I ordered came in damaged so I had to send it back. I'm not a huge fan of the long tail, It's awkward when I'm carrying the board. Overall, I think it's a good board for a good price for a beginner like me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best built board on the planet !!
customer_reviews.text: Bigly for beginners ,big wheels and solid construction. 2 would fit on this board. Tall teen loves it! Thank you for making a board for riders,not acrobats. It will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: nursehealer

customer_reviews.title: Very good long board for the price that deserves the many ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good long board for the price that deserves the many good reviews it has. We like it a lot. My kids are fluent with skateboards and rip sticks, but did not have a long board due to the many other boards we already have. They like this one after riding it, and say the maneuverability is very good. The wheel and trucks make the difference between most of these boards if you believe the reviews from other boards, and these are good. It's also physically larger than we expected, which is a Good Thing. I have smaller kids and they can ride it well, in part, because it's big and stable.
customer_reviews.author: George M.

customer_reviews.title: Cracked deck. Bad product.
customer_reviews.text: Cracked deck after about 5 uses. Very disappointed and don’t see any way to return it. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Skorey

customer_reviews.title: My son give this skateboard 2 thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my young adult son who still loves to skateboard. He said it’s a great longboard, price for as reasonable & after several weeks it’s still performing very well.
customer_reviews.author: Miss E

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Longboard for my little brother mostly because it was the cheapest longboard I could find in this style. He loves it and uses it as often as possible and sometimes even in the middle of the winter so long as there isn't any ice on the ground. I find that a little extreme but its the only way he can have fun while exercising or so he says.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Walters

customer_reviews.title: Too long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this skateboard for my 13 year old grandson. Way too big. Way to big. Super long.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride, sturdy board
customer_reviews.text: Comparing this with my last board, feel less bumps in the road since wheels have give. Board is also sturdy, slight flex when I jump on it but doesn't feel anywhere close to breaking. Trucks are also well lubricated, can control turns better.
customer_reviews.author: melly_ru

customer_reviews.title: Great board
customer_reviews.text: Change out the bushings to match your weight, it comes with super hard ones. Otherwise, this board is a great value, and the bushings are a really inexpensive upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a pro by any means, but this board is fantastic for a beginner like myself. Just 2 days ago I hopped on a friend's longboard and instantly was hooked. Immediately, I searched online for long boards and was a bit bummed to see that quality boards were priced around $150+. Saw the high reviews for this board, took the plunge, and just took it out for its first ride. The board was shipped SOOOO quickly and very securely. Everything seems very quality (again, not an expert) - but I most definitely agree with other buyers that this board is worth every penny, ESPECIALLY at the steal it is now!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great board for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great board for a great price. This was the first long board I purchased and I am very impressed by it. Very smooth ride and very durable deck which has the feel like surfing. The only thing you may want to replace at first are the wheel bearings. But a little oil lubricant will do just as well. All in alli give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Scott Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Good Heavy Duty skate deck.
customer_reviews.text: well made skate board, sturdy with stylish graphics and tough trucks, bearings and wheel sets. I didn't think there was a board that would hold my 330 lb bulk. This one does with room to spare. It's a great product
customer_reviews.author: bumpystick

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I bought this for a neighbor after running over their board with my car. For the price, this is an amazing board compared to the junk that they sell at the big box stores. She was blown away that I replaced it with this board considering that she had a cheap walmart special. The quality of this is amazing. Even my 13 year old son looked at me and told me he was jealous that I went out and bough such a nice board. But for the money, this thing is awesome. Great gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis dad

customer_reviews.title: You will experience wheel bite.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the board at first and it was fun to ride around and cruise,until I realized you cannot not carve hard or well with this board. I've had many instances where the board would experience wheel bite (when the board touches the wheel) and I would launch off my board at high speeds. This board definitely needs smaller wheels or better carvings in the board. Would not recommend to smaller children if so make sure they have a helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: and have found it very easy to learn on and tons of fun to ride
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to start longboarding with as an absolute beginner, and have found it very easy to learn on and tons of fun to ride. I mostly use it for cruising longer distances on paths and for transportation around the city.
customer_reviews.author: Angie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great board!
customer_reviews.text: Great board for the price. My first longboard, wasn't sure I'd get into riding one, didn't want to invest much... but this one is great. Deck has a great contour, the wheels are big and make for a smooth ride. Love this board, and will keep on riding!
customer_reviews.author: K Steb

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Great long board for price, very sturdy, very smooth. Didn't know what It meant for commute... I wouldn't want to ride it for longer than a few miles. But I do ride it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: For the price...? Super win.
customer_reviews.text: I've been riding this bad boy for just over a week, and I love it. I use it to cruise around my college campus, and now I just can't walk anymore. I just want to ride it all the time!! I get let lots of compliments on this board, and a lot of my friends are impressed that I got it at such a stellar price. The deck is pretty rigid, and you might want to get different bearings after a while (I'm considering it), but for the price... you can't beat it. REALLY recommend this for a first longboard.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron H.

customer_reviews.title: Decent deck, Bearings wear down unevenly.
customer_reviews.text: Had this board over 3 years. Great board and trucks. Bearings wear down unevenly. The front right and back left roll decent still. The others need replacement.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Had this board for years, changed the wheel as soon as I got them so can't tell you anything about that but otherwise its a pretty good board especially for newbies.
customer_reviews.author: Domonique C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect longboard for all ability levels!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Quest Super Cruiser Longboard Skateboard for my 13 year old Son and myself to ride. This was a perfect buy. We both love riding it. It rides extremely smooth up and down streets and sidewalks alike. I may have to purchase a second one; due to the fact that it has been tough to get my Son to step off it long enough for me to steal a ride. This is a perfect longboard for the relative beginner to the Old Man who has over 45 years of boarding under his belt. I HIGHLY RECCOMEND THIS LONGBOARD!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Commuter Longboard
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this board as a commuter for my short trip to and from work. I hadn't ridden a skateboard in fifteen years and this was an easy way to get back into it. I have found the board very stable and also responsive. I have ridden it in all conditions and it is still performing well. It could have better wheels but they are good considering the price of the product. I don't what it would be like if you are a serious longboard rider but as a commuter with a few downhill sections to carve it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Deck is split and trucks are crooked. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: adriane feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but really nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: I recently got a job and bought myself a longboard since I've always wanted one. I wasn't that good until I started practicing on this. It smelled like chemicals when it first came but I guess that's just a factory thing. Some reviews say it broke but what are you doing to make it fall apart? It's a longboard so I ride it with minimal tricks and sometimes jump on it. Weight also matters. If you're around 300 pounds, it might best to ride it like it was meant to be rather than jumping or trying to break it. I'm 5'2, weighing 103 pounds. To me it's pretty big but manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Fedelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginner board.
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect starter board for a beginner. The only issue i had with it was the nose. I dont like the lip cause im not looking to do front tricks on it. After about 3 months i sold it and got a Sector 9 which is 10 times better. But over all this is a perfect beginner board.
customer_reviews.author: Review King

customer_reviews.title: When I was a kid we had skateboards...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas, since all her friends have one. It is good quality and looks pretty cool. Apparently there are different types of longboards, and this one was not the right one. I gave it a test, and it is much more fun to cruise around on than a skateboard, but I guess she didn't want a cruiser type of board. Oh well, she still uses it and likes riding it. I'm sure my son will eventually steal it from her:)
customer_reviews.author: Pete Paul

customer_reviews.title: Tighten your bolts!
customer_reviews.text: Very good price for a functioning longboard! Mine came with loose trucks, tighten your bolts to secure the trucks to the board better! Very smooth ride for such a inexpensive board, good starter board for beginners, see if you like it without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loose kingpins
customer_reviews.text: The kingpins come loose pretty easily. I've cranked them down with a ratchet and they still loosen up pretty bad after a couple short trips to the store and back. It's a shame because everything else about the board is great.
customer_reviews.author: J Stark

customer_reviews.title: Great Raffle Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a Jack and Jill Party, to be raffled. I grabbed this as a "lightening deal" and am very happy with the quality. I am definitely gonna buy a bunch of tickets to try and win it back. I like the Natural Bamboo finish, sharp looking. I just bought a similar one for cruising the local rail trail and I love it for early morning cruises. Just Buy It!
customer_reviews.author: inimitable idiot

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, got standard bearings, it’s a beautiful looking board, had I adjust the trucks and wheels a little when I got it but that’s totally understandable, rides great, and love the colors and quality, pretty dang good deal for how cheap it is, great beginner board, only downside is that it is a little heavy, so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: peter casares

customer_reviews.title: Good quality long board
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this long board is very good. I only learn skateboarding in Youtube during Shelter In Place, but it is a good sport that you can learn and practice on your own. I will recommend to buy a normal skateboard instead of a long board, because skateboard is earlier to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Kary

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!  Good for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Shipping got hung up, but we got it just before Christmas! My 12 year old loves the design! However he is planning on changing out the barring as the wheels dont spin as nicely as he likes, but overall not a bad longboard especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Im a total beginner so i was just using this in empty parking lots to get some basics in and it was great at first but as you pick up just a little speed it starts making a loud rattling sound. I bought this because it was pretty cheap and it had lots of good reviews but unfortunately i either received a faulty one or something so its kind of disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Love this board
customer_reviews.text: Love this board. High quality components. A LITTLE tall for my liking, making speed for a tall guy like me a little harder to control. It also comes a little squishy out of the box, so I recommend tightening the trucks a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Alec J. Yetter

customer_reviews.title: Long Board
customer_reviews.text: So far it looks good. It’s actually a lot larger than what I imagined but very durable. I’ll write an update after Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Ellzey

customer_reviews.title: A Well Received Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend and he swears that he and his kid love it. I can't personally say weather or not you'll be carving the sidewalk like a pro on this board, but from what I have heard it is a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Musarra

customer_reviews.title: Firm
customer_reviews.text: Good board, but very stiff. Not the longboard for someone looking for a flexible ride.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT, SMOOTH-RIDING BOARD FOR ANY RIDER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sammy and I am 13 years old and I got it for my birthday! Its a great skateboard and it is very long and smooth. It's very good when it comes to riding down the curb and it is pretty smooth when going over/down bumps. I recommend this board to any rider(beginners and advanced). It has a reasonable weight to it! Its a great wooden board. I really recommend this... bye. I hope this review was helpful enough
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my board!!! Its the perfect board to learn on! Its so stable and easy to ride! I would recommend it to any beginner for sure! Be aware that it is a longer board
customer_reviews.author: Fersal12

customer_reviews.title: My first longboard
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to compare but this is an awesome first long board! Easy to learn on and after a few days of riding with my brother we've overcame what we thought was precipitous hills to now a breeze in the wind. He also has an Quest board
customer_reviews.author: TechyDude

customer_reviews.title: Great long board !
customer_reviews.text: used to skate board. Never owned a long board. Got it for fun and absolutely addicted now. Get you a set of redz bearings to go with it and take off. There is a complaint of some rattling and what not coming from the trucks. Just tighten down the bolt a couple turns and that goes away.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginner board
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son likes this board. It's his first longboard, and it's good for learning on
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mayne

customer_reviews.title: Grandson enjoying it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson on his 13th birthday. It is his first long board and he loves it. He particularly likes that It is a little wider than ones he had previously ridden. .
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great in curves
customer_reviews.text: Excellent board. My daughter loves it. Very maneuverable. Can make turns very well. Was so good bought a second one for my oldest son.
customer_reviews.author: Duiserbike

customer_reviews.title: Great Relaxed Cruising for Big Guys!
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner, so you can take this with a grain of salt. Rider is 6-2 255lbs. Supports my weight with hardly any flex. I find the ride to be smooth and effortless. Saw many reviews suggesting to change the bearings and tighten the trucks, but I find it to be just fine out of the box for my taste. I am not trying to a bunch of tricks with the board. I just want a nice board to get out an really cruise, and this board fits the bill. I would recommend this board especially at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory W

customer_reviews.title: Great board!
customer_reviews.text: Great board for the price! Just took it for the first ride. It was great! Rocks, acorns and most every sidewalk seam and trail deviation was handled as smoothly as my sector 9 board. Board flex was not as forgiving, still it's great for a smooth relaxing ride.
customer_reviews.author: V.mains

customer_reviews.title: Greetings from Japan!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! It might not be the best board but it's pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Cotton

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made, has a nice look, great steering, does well down hills.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Very creaky!
customer_reviews.text: It was a good price but very creaky when you stand on the board and shift your weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kamni

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift. Very nice. Granddaughter really liked it. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Packaging and product REEKED of cigarette smoke
customer_reviews.text: The package was permeated with the smell of cigarettes. I opened the box hoping that the skateboard wouldn’t be affected, but it smelled overwhelmingly horribly as well. I aired it overnight, but it still smelled the following day. It was so saturated with cigarette stench, that it made the entire downstairs of our house stink. If I was purchasing this package from a physical store and it smelled like that, I never would have bought it. Disgusting!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Good starter board
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter board, not the highest quality, but good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Nice beginner board for my teenager. It split after a month and had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Pat, a lover of books

customer_reviews.title: Good quality very sturdy. Not so easy to learn on.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality very sturdy. Not so easy to learn on. My son broke his foot
customer_reviews.author: kristi

customer_reviews.title: Great board, son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son and he uses almost every day. The neighbor kids use it too. Great buy, good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa O Byers

customer_reviews.title: You can feel the great quality
customer_reviews.text: Beginner here, and this board is great. I’m 6’ 170 lbs and this board comes up to my stomach. HUGE BOARD, which is great. Gives plenty of room to move your feet and work on placement. No complaints here whatsoever, already recommended it to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Zach F.

customer_reviews.title: fun stick
customer_reviews.text: this is a perfect longboard for me. i picked it because the reviews said it was easy to control for a first timer. at my age (58) i didn't want to be working too hard just to get some fun exercise. so far it seems very durable and capable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Garcia

customer_reviews.title: My teenagers like this long board and it has held up well ...
customer_reviews.text: My teenagers like this long board and it has held up well over the last 7 months we've owned it. It's not as flashy as one may like or I remember having as a kid in the 70's but it appears to be made of quality materials and is smooth to ride. Of course when dad out-rides his teenagers on skateboards and snowboards, its all good. Bring on the unicycle, Dad can do that too!
customer_reviews.author: Dad of All Trades

customer_reviews.title: Amazing board for the sale price of $67
customer_reviews.text: This is my first longboard so I do not have much to base my opinion on. I opened the box, unwrapped the board, got on and cruised down to the gas station(very slightly downhill) without touching the ground with my feet at all. It was easy to steer and went plenty fast for a beginner. At 50% off this board is 5 star worthy. At full price I'd pick another board that is on sale. PS. This is board is pretty long.
customer_reviews.author: Shanzy

customer_reviews.title: Good board
customer_reviews.text: Used to ride in high school was pretty easy to get the hang of.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

product_meta.title: Quest QT-NSC44C The Super Cruiser The Original Artisan Bamboo and Maple 44" Longboard Skateboard,Black
product_meta.description:
Made in Mars, Grounded in L.A.

Our 44-Inch Artisan Super Longboard with beautiful Bamboo and Maple deck, original abstract graphics, rugged aluminum trucks and durable 70mm PU wheels. This classic Longboard will take you where you need to go in style. It's great for around town, getting to class or cruising along the boardwalk. Top quality components ensure maximum durability and optimal performance. Life is a Quest, enjoy the ride.

About Our Company

Made in Mars is a rethinking of what a board sports company is all about. Due to our "alien" company culture, we embraced the "Made in Mars" name. Looking around we saw a lot of companies in our Biz, many that were doing a good, and sometimes even a great job at making boards and trying to fit into the "Action Sports lifestyle". This was all great, but it just wasn't for us.

We design and make our own product, so we know what we are asking you to spend your money on. Next we wanted to offer the best of the tradition brands, and by working with some of the real pioneers of the Skateboard, Surf and Snow Board world, help reinvent them using today's best components, great fresh art and new technology. We also dreamed up a couple of brand new initiatives, because one size never fits all. We did all this, keeping better components and the highest quality. Trust us that isn’t easy and definitely makes for some long days.
feature_bullets: SIZE MATTERS our 44" Longboard is the perfect size constructed in a Multi-ply Hardwood Maple and beautiful artisan bamboo deck shaped to perform and the extra detail rarely found at this price.
THE ORIGINAL BAMBOO LONGBOARD - Designed on the boardwalks in California to higher specifications from Malibu to San Diego, we are the leaders in longboard and skateboard.

AUTHENTIC COMPONENTS- Genuine ABEC 7 speed bearings, 7 Ply Super Flex Bamboo and Hardwood Maple Deck, 7-inch aluminum trucks, This 44"" Artisan Bamboo Longboard, Better components = Better performance
DARE TO COMPARE Not all longboards are the same, Quest longboards are made with better materials and components if you are looking for a pro style longboard at a great price. look no further.

MADE IN MARS- We design and make nearly 100% of our own product. The best of the tradition brands, working with some of the real pioneers of the Skate, Surf and Snow Board world, help reinvent them using today’s best components, great fresh art and new technology.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
